Articles.Content:
Is there a working mod in existence that has a part that operates like the extendable thermal radiators, as in it pulls heat from the whole ship, but stores it until you are able to extend a radiator? this would be great on SSTO planes because you don't want to extend your radiators in the atmosphere but you still want to use your jets to get more speed and are burning up. It could be like water tanks used in some off-grid home heating systems where excess heat is stored in large insulated tanks until it is needed. It could be heavy for its size to keep it from being op in game.

Edited July 5, 2016 by Zero266

I don't know about any mod with that functionality,but you can use this small MM patch that will make stock radiator panels act like extendable ones. 

@PART[radPanel*]:AFTER[Squad]
{
@MODULE[ModuleActiveRadiator]
 {
 !parentCoolingOnly = DELETE
 }
}

Generally you'd use fuel as a heatsink - I don't  really understand the fine details of the current heating, but the mass of fuel in the tank certainly matters. I don't know if expelling fuel dumps heat, though...
